price: Dan milik-Nya segala apa yang ada di langit dan di bumi, dan kepada-Nyalah (ibadah dan) ketaatan selama-lamanya. Mengapa kamu takut kepada selain Allah?
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walahu al-dīnu wāṣiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaqūna
